short_summary: Contract_4009 is a consulting services contract
description: This engagement is for a Request for Abbreviated Proposals (RFAP) to add an Inuit Registry qualified firm to the defence construction industry to provide contaminated sites and environmental compliance consulting services valuing from 200,000 to 500,000 dollars under a source list.
duration_in_months: But now, add that the duration In months is 1
